QueryResult.text: select odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.id object_instance_id, a.user_id from cmn_sec_chk_user_v0 a, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt where a.object_id = 5011390 and a.permission_code = 'READ' and a.object_instance_id = odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.id UNION select odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.id object_instance_id, a.user_id from cmn_sec_chk_user_v0 a, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt where a.object_id in (5011392) and a.permission_code = 'READ' and a.object_instance_id = odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.odf_parent_id
